item.title: Lithuania Youth love Basketball
item.description: Lithuania is a basketball crazy nation - which may seem odd if you know little about this newer European Union state.

item.description: In Vilnius, the capital city of Lithuania its youth get up to no good.

item.title: Lithuanian Youth love their mobiles
item.description: In Lithuania mobile penetration is almost at 150% - so is this all from younger people sim swapping?

item.title: Lithuanian Youth love to use the Internet
item.description: In Lithuania the usage of the internet is reaching saturation point.

item.title: What kids do online: UK Internet Usage
item.description: Recent indepth report from New Media Age in the UK focused on the internet usage habits of kids.
